message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. After considering its value, I am willing to offer $13,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer of $13,000, I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,750.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $13,500 for the product.
